tool_description:
"Respect is earned by the respect you show to others." 
This service takes any string as an input and replace bad words in many languages with stars or remove them based on your need. You can use it to make the reviews on your app/website/blog clean of inconvenient words.
name: NoBadWords
title: NoBadWords

api_list.name: do
api_list.description: This is the main endpoint of the api. Just send your string.
